About me

I have two hobbies, one is computer science, I loved the function of computers and wished to grow skills in the area as time moved on. I also have a hobby in aviation, I love airplanes and wish to fly ASAP.

I have been coding for 3 years, I have experience with Roblox Studio, Unity, Unreal Engine 4/5 in Game Development. On the Front/Back end of things, I have experience with JavaScript, React, Vue, Lua, Java, and Python.

I have been running and building Discord bots for more then 2 years. I'm hoping to expand and create websites too, but I don't have that many resources at the moment.

Bot Options

Roblox Discord Bot

Create a dynamic link between your Discord Guild and your Roblox Group with one easy bot. You will be able to do things such as post a group shout, rank and demote members, and require members to verify with Bloxlink, plus the bot comes with a built-in XP system and suspension feature so you can temporarily demote a Staff member, and will automatically be re-promoted after a set time of your choosing. Plus more! You may also keep track of milestones in a dedicated channel to announce when you reach that sweet goal of 1000 members or 10 Million! The choice is yours! More information in Discord guild.

Music Discord Bot

Stream fresh tunes on YouTube and SoundCloud to your Voice Channel using a dedicated bot created for your Discord guild! When you use a bot, you don't receive any ads you would get, say goodbye to interruptions! Plus skip as many songs, control the volume, and shuffle your song queue, all free with the bot! No more paywalls! More information in Discord guild.
